title: Happy Green Cows
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Greek, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A typical taverna, the menu includes a vegetarian section. Reported salads and pasta dishes could be made vegan upon request. The veggie burger patty and vegetable spring rolls are vegan suitable. Local wine. Has Wi-Fi. Jul 2015 reported there are other places in town that offer more veg choices.
